1.12.2.airplanes_a0.8.jar: New items, new stuff, new textures, start of energy
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.7.jar: New items (suitcase, cpus, a display and circuit boards) and blocks
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.6.jar: Added gears: wooden, stone, iron, golden and diamond gear
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.5.jar: Added Combustion Engine, a new Block to produce energy.
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.4.jar: First processing blocks. Also includes a new crafting item / block, the Coil.
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.3.jar: Block expansions and basic crafting elements
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.0.2.jar: This pre-alpha build includes an updated Airplanes Part Builder and the first blocks and items. In addition, we now have enhanced language support.
1.12.2.airplanes_a0.0.1.jar: First version, only for ALPHA testing.
